document.description: ID of the [File](https://stripe.com/docs/api/files) holding the image of the identity document used in this check.

code.description: A short machine-readable string giving the reason for the verification failure.

reason.description: A human-readable message giving the reason for the failure. These messages can be shown to your users.

error.description: Details on the verification error. Present when status is `unverified`.

selfie.description: ID of the [File](https://stripe.com/docs/api/files) holding the image of the selfie used in this check.
